WorkItem.ClosedComment: Closing as there have been no additional notes to this, and I can't repro w/ 2.3.19.
WorkItem.Description: Whenever I use the optimizer for my DPS DK, it takes hit from a normal value, to a large negative one (once to -7.xx, the other time to -40.xx) and optimizes accordingly (actually penalizing items with hit on them). I've attached my toon's XML file.
WorkItem.Summary: [DPSDK] Hit drastically changes in value after an Optimize

Comments.Message: I was not able to replicate this issue in the current code

I just tried it again.

1) Loaded the above .xml file.
2) Ran the optimizer (full thoroughness, no flasks, regem etc)
3) Loaded the suggested gearing (note that it doesn't 
4) Hit was indeed at -40.37. 

Note: If I don't load the optimized gear, the hit value stays at its normal value, and doesn't drop to -40.37. 

I'll try and get on a different computer to see if it's something specific to my machine.
Same happens to me as warrior. In the attached file checking Heroic Presence lowers my DPS.

Is this still an issue for your DPSDK in 2.3.8?

Oougho please open a separate ticket for your Arms Warrior
